<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Add cascade delete to Escalation Histories table: sysrule_escalate_history</description>
        <name>Add cascade delete to Escalation History</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'sysrule_escalate_history');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'escalation');
	gr.addNullQuery('reference_cascade_rule');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('reference_cascade_rule', 'delete');
		gr.update();
	}
    return;
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-04-06 16:24:33</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6a9f542153462110610bddeeff7b1214</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add cascade delete to Escalation History</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Escalation Engine" source="com.snc.escalate">079674643cb1311068bcf327dfe37fa0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_6a9f542153462110610bddeeff7b1214</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-06 16:24:33</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
